description: This source file (AppGateway.cpp) appears to be part of a plugin related to an application gateway, implementing core functionalities for interfacing with the gateway infrastructure. The accompanying files suggest implementation of various components such as responder, resolver, implementation specifics, indicating a modular, plugin-based architecture.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main plugin class managing the application gateway's core functionalities and interface.

classes.name: Implementation
classes.description: Implements the internal logic and interfacing mechanisms of the AppGateway plugin.

classes.name: Responder
classes.description: Handles response mechanisms within the AppGateway framework.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Manages resolution of gateway-related queries or configurations.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Defines module-specific setup and teardown routines for the plugin.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Performs initial setup for the AppGateway plugin.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleans up resources when the plugin is unloaded.
